name: Coach Quotes
description: One-line quote from a coach that sounds like gospel
prompt: Write 1 fictional quote from an AI startup coach. The quote should be one line, punchy, and dead serious about something absurd, tactical, or spiritual. Choose one of these coaches: Rohan Mehta (aggressive Wall Street tone), Donte Disrupt (chaotic visionary), Kailey Sloan (alignment-obsessed and low-key spiraling), Venus Metrics (execution maximalist), Alex Vega (wellness-DTC energy), or Eljas Virtanen (philosophical eco-founder). The quote must sound like something clipped from a live panel and passed around Discord like gospel. Do not explain or introduce. Just give a single quote with the coach's name.
outro: Apply this principle and report back on your ascension.

name: Crowd Favorites
description: Meme-worthy one-liner that gets tattooed on founders' arms
prompt: Write 1 one-liner piece of 'Founder Wisdom' from a fictional startup coach. This should sound like the kind of advice that gets clipped, meme-ified, and tattooed on a stressed-out founder's arm. Tone: clever, haunting, too real. The line should be attributed to one coach: Donte, Kailey, Rohan, Venus, Alex, or Eljas. Make it pithy, darkly motivational, and weirdly insightful. No fluff. No intros. Just one powerful wisdom quote.
intro: Most-saved quote from The Vibe CEO Archives:

name: Micro-Masterclass
description: Short, strange but useful coaching tip from a coach
prompt: Write 1 fictional micro-masterclass blurb, 1-2 sentences, delivered by an AI startup coach. This blurb should feel like the strangest, most useful thing you've ever heard at a founder bootcamp. The tone should blend self-help, strategy, and startup absurdism. Choose one coach: Donte (pitch chaos), Venus (execution control), Kailey (founder fragility), Alex (spiritual product rituals), Eljas (climate mysticism), or Rohan (financial ruthlessness). Prefix with 🎓 and the coach's name, then their lesson.
outro: Class dismissed. Apply immediately for optimal transformation.

name: Upcoming Events
description: Fictional upcoming event for the Discord community
prompt: Create one fictional upcoming event for a weird but elite AI startup Discord community. The event should sound fun, useful, unhinged, and somehow very real. Use playful startup jargon, coach involvement, and include a hook (what's happening, who's involved, and why it might be chaotic). Keep it to 2–3 sentences max. Do not use bullet points or headers. This is a one-off teaser. Match the tone of an underground pitch night run by founder-therapists and execution cultists.
outro: Check your calendar. RSVP by reacting below. Limited slots available.
